description.value:
Your ostilli can use its stored magic to help staunch your wounds, granting you the Administer Ambient Magic action.

Administer Ambient Magic 2 (healing)

Frequency once per hour

Effect Your ostilli pulses a calm lavender color as it converts stored magic into a curative balm. You regain 2d4 Hit Points, and you can immediately attempt a flat check to recover from persistent bleed damage with the DC reduced to 10. This healing increases by 2d4 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
